newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-HAMPSHIRE WIN TOSS, BAT AGAINST AUSTRALIA.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-HAMPSHIRE WIN TOSS, BAT AGAINST AUSTRALIA.

text.p: Hampshire won the toss and decided to bat against Australia on the first day of their three-day match on Saturday.
Hampshire - Matthew Hayden, Jason Laney, Matthew Keech, Robin Smith, Will Kendall, John Stephenson (captain), Adrian Aymes, Shaun Udal, Simon Renshaw, Stuart Milburn, James Bovill.
Australia - Mark Taylor (captain), Matthew Elliott, Greg Blewett, Mark Waugh, Steve Waugh, Michael Bevan, Ian Healy, Shane Warne, Paul Reiffel, Jason Gillespie, Michael Kasprowicz.
